content.raw:
Hi all, 

I've been trying to test the cloudsim setup. I am able to launch a constellation, ssh into both the fc and the simulation server, and bash into the respective docker containers. However, I cannot start the simulator through the cloudsim interface (when I click to "1" it says request was successful, but then I could not see any activity on the simulation server side). It is guaranteed that I am missing a piece or doing something wrong, but cannot pinpoint it. 

So, could you please give more details on what exactly happens in which order and where when:
1) we launch the constellation
2) we start simulation
3) we start the fc

Also, following @knitfoo's advice, I located the simserver and fc AWS images, and was able to launch them. However, the VPC (and other network) settings are unknown so I wasn't able to replicate cloudsim setup exactly. 

Would you be able to give more information about these details? 

Cheers,
Cetin
content.html:
Hi all,

I've been trying to test the cloudsim setup. I am able to launch a constellation, ssh into both the fc and the simulation server, and bash into the respective docker containers. However, I cannot start the simulator through the cloudsim interface (when I click to "1" it says request was successful, but then I could not see any activity on the simulation server side). It is guaranteed that I am missing a piece or doing something wrong, but cannot pinpoint it.

So, could you please give more details on what exactly happens in which order and where when: 1) we launch the constellation 2) we start simulation 3) we start the fc

Also, following @knitfoo's advice, I located the simserver and fc AWS images, and was able to launch them. However, the VPC (and other network) settings are unknown so I wasn't able to replicate cloudsim setup exactly.

Would you be able to give more information about these details?

Cheers, Cetin
